casebody.data:
HERMANN BOKER & CO. v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 23, 1906.) No. 145 (3769). Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. For decision below, see 140 Fed. 115. Walden & Webster (Howard T Walden, of counsel), for appellants. Henry A. Wise, Asst U. S. Atty.

Before LACOMBE and COXE; Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed in open court
